excerpt: "With the crumbling of the third-party cookie empire, the digital marketing landscape is undergoing a seismic shift. Data collection and AI, used ethically, can become the beacon in this storm, guiding marketers toward a future where understanding their audience doesn’t equate to violating their privacy."
